title.rendered: “IDF Launches Precision Strikes on Hezbollah Targets in Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked Hezbollah terror targets in Lebanon overnight; a military site of Hezbollah was attacked along with a weapons depot and additional terror infrastructures.

Combat aircraft attacked a military site of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Jabal Tora area in Lebanon during the night.

At the same time, combat aircraft struck a weapons storage facility of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Kfarshouba area, a military structure in the Talousa area, and terror infrastructures of the organization in the Houla and Ayta a-Shaab regions in southern Lebanon.

In addition, IDF forces carried out artillery fire to eliminate threats in several areas in southern Lebanon.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/3xK3gcR
